title: 'Stranger Things' Star Joe Keery Just Got a Bowl Cut and You Need to Brace Yourself
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Stranger Things star Joe Keery cut his hair.

He has a bowl cut now.



Yes, I'm serious.

Ugh, Friday the 13th strikes again. If you were a fan of Joe Keery's thick, wavy tresses, you'll be pissed to find out that he cut it all off. People get haircuts all the time—it's just how hair and the world works! But as InStyle put it, Joe's hair has become part of his whole persona and everyone has become obsessed with his mullet ever since he grew it out for Stranger Things. He's basically like the Ethan Craft of 2019, and we need to know if he lathers, rinses, and repeats, if he air dries or blow dries with a barrel brush, and if there's any pomade involved. We have questions!!! But now, IDK if we'll ever get the answers to them because Joe just went and chopped all his hair off into a bowl cut!

I wish I was joking, but his mullet is no more and all that's left is some forehead bangs and a long sideburn situation. Here's Joe before:

View photos Photo credit: Matt Winkelmeyer - Getty Images More

RIP to that look.

And here he is now:

View photos Photo credit: Stefanie Keenan - Getty Images More

Y'all, I-

View photos Photo credit: STEFANIE< KEENAN QWZZ] - Getty Images More

Joe debuted this new look last night at the launch of the new Chanel fragrance, but honestly, it's hard to tell if this is his vibe now or if it's for a role. (His IMDB page says he has one movie, Free Guy, coming up in 2020, but that's in post-production already, so this could very well just be his own doing.)

But after looking at it for a minute, the shock has worn off and it's starting to look a bit rock 'n' roll like the dudes from Oasis, no? Or a bit like The Beatles?

Let's just be glad hair grows back.

description: I'd like to speak with the manager, please.
